channel.title: Gold MVP didn't reward extra gold
channel.description:
#### What happened?: When i won i got voted Gold MVP and yet i received no extra gold
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Get 250 gold
#### Steps to reproduce: N/ A
#### Comments: https://1drv.ms/u/s!AqX01UPHZipshwpTl0YR1jRDpden screenshot of the victory screen missing the 250 gold
